description.line1: A calm place overlooking Mt. Yahata,
description.line2: a cozy farmhouse stay just right for you.

bathroom.title: Bathroom & Toilet
bathroom.description:
Shower, body soap, shampoo
Hair dryer, flush toilet with bidet

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description:
Refrigerator, microwave, electric kettle
Frying pan, pots, plates, cups, tongs, chopsticks
Cutting board, knife, gas stove, dining table

laundry.title: Laundry & Linen
laundry.description: Washing machine, drying rack, face towels, up to 5 futons

checkin.title: Check-in
checkin.description:
Check-in from 16:00
(Please contact us if after 19:00)
Check-out by 10:00
